title: Schneider's
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Snackbar cafe in the city centre opposite the old opera. Menu has 2 vegan sandwiches made with pate from legumes. Green smoothies.
streetAddress: Bockenheimer Landstrasse 5, An der Alten Oper
